Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Murderer \Mur"der*er\ (m[^u]r"d[~e]r*[~e]r), n. 1. One guilty of murder; a person who, in possession of his reason, unlawfully kills a human being with premeditated malice. [1913 Webster]
2. A small cannon, formerly used for clearing a ship's decks of boarders; -- called also {murdering piece}. [Obs.] [1913 Webster]
murderer n : a criminal who commits homicide (who performs the unlawful premeditated killing of another human being) [syn: {liquidator}, {manslayer}]
